summary: Completed comprehensive testing of three new dashboard pages (Calendar, Deliverables, Assets). All backend APIs (25 tests) passed 100%. Frontend UI testing confirmed all features working correctly including filters, status updates, date changes, and navigation links.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/calendar - returns submissions for specified month
Backend: GET /api/calendar - scopes data to client
Backend: GET /api/deliverables - returns assets with episode info
Backend: GET /api/assets/library - returns enriched assets
Backend: PATCH /api/assets/{id}/status - updates asset status (Draft/Final)
Backend: PATCH /api/assets/{id}/submission - links/unlinks assets to episodes
Backend: PATCH /api/submissions/{id} - updates status and release date
Backend: GET /api/submissions/list - returns minimal submission data for dropdowns
Frontend: Calendar page loads with month view and navigation
Frontend: Calendar shows events on release dates with content type badges
Frontend: Calendar filters work (content type, status)
Frontend: Calendar detail panel opens with title, guest, description
Frontend: Calendar status change via buttons works with toast notification
Frontend: Calendar release date change via date picker works
Frontend: Calendar 'Open in Submissions' link navigates correctly
Frontend: Deliverables page loads with table of all assets
Frontend: Deliverables filters work (type, status, content type, search)
Frontend: Deliverables inline status dropdown changes asset status
Frontend: Deliverables episode name links to submissions page
Frontend: Assets page loads with all client assets
Frontend: Assets filters work (type, status, search)
Frontend: Assets inline status dropdown changes asset status
Frontend: Assets 'Mark Final' button works for Draft assets
Frontend: Assets link/unlink episode dropdown works
Frontend: All pages scope data to logged-in client only
Frontend: All status changes show toast notifications
seed_data_creation: None - used existing seed data from previous iterations
context_for_next_testing_agent: All three new dashboard pages (Calendar, Deliverables, Assets) are fully functional. Calendar shows events in January 2026 (Building a Personal Brand Jan 5, Quick Tips Jan 10, Webinar Jan 20). Deliverables shows 14 items linked to episodes. Assets shows 14 items with Mark Final buttons for Draft assets. All CRUD operations, filters, and navigation links work correctly. Test credentials: alex@company.com / client123 (client), admin@forgevoice.com / admin123 (admin).
